item.title: Random pvp drop
item.dc:creator: @spon80 spon80
item.description:
@spon80 wrote:

OKAY everythings good atm. except getting the item to give it to the player that killed you any help?

[code]public void cwdie()
{
if(cwdie2()) {

    teleportToX = 2806;
    teleportToY = 2785;
    heightLevel = 0;
    EntangleDelay = 0;
            teleblock = false;
            //pEmote = 10;
    //pWalk = 13;
    hitDiff = 0;    
    updateRequired = true;

appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
removeAllItems();
for(int r=0; r<playerEquipment.length; r++) {
try {
int item = playerEquipment[r];
if((item > 0) && (item < 20000)) {
remove(item, r);
}
} catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(“ERROR: Removing Equipment”); }
}
removeAllItems();
teleportToX = 2806;
teleportToY = 2785;
EntangleDelay = 0;
teleblock = false;
//pEmote = 15;
//pWalk = 13;
sendMessage(“Oh dear! You Have Gotten Pwned!!! OH NOES!”);
hitDiff = 0;
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
addItem(Item2.randomBarrows(), 1);
}
}
[/code]

i used my add item void and it gives me 2 barrows items but it gives it to the person that died, any help?

i think i have everything declared. heres my main code.

public void cwdie() { if(cwdie2()) { heightLevel = 0; EntangleDelay = 0; teleblock = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; for(int r=0; r<playerEquipment.length; r++) { try { int item = playerEquipment[r]; if((item > 0) && (item < 20000)) { remove(item, r); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("ERROR: Removing Equipment"); } } removeAllItems(); add random item to the ground so that only the player that killed p2 can see(); //???? teleportToX = 2806; teleportToY = 2785; EntangleDelay = 0; teleblock = false; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear! You Have Gotten Pwned!!! OH NOES!"); hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } }
